message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $100. As you know, I have a great track record of selling high-quality products, with 80% of my products being high-quality. I'm confident that this one is no exception. Would you like to take advantage of this great opportunity and make a purchase?
Thank you for the offer. Based on your track record and the high probability of the product being high-quality, I am willing to make the purchase.

Welcome! I'm glad to offer you another high-quality product. As you know, my track record is still looking strong, with 2 out of 2 high-quality products sold so far. I'm confident that this one will continue the trend. However, I want to remind you that the probability of a product being low-quality is still 20%. If you're willing to take the risk, you can get this product for $100. What do you think?
Thank you for your confidence in the product quality. I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $100.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the bonus incentive and am willing to take the risk based on your impressive track record. I will purchase the product for $100.
